panels.description: Reports the number of times that the CPU usage has reached the value set in limits
panels.title: CPU Throttled

panels.description:
Deployments = Replica missmatch  
Statefulsets = Replica missmatch  
Daemonsets = Replica missmatch
panels.title: Deploy status

panels.description: Reports the number of times that the memory usage has reached the value set in limits
panels.title: Memory Limit Rate

targets.expr:
topk (5, sum by(app, method, uri) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", uri!~".*prometheus.*|.*healthcheck.*|root|/\\{name\\}/\\{profiles.*"}[$__rate_interval]))
/
(sum by(app, method, uri) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", uri!~".*prometheus.*|.*healthcheck.*|root|/\\{name\\}/\\{profiles.*"}[$__rate_interval])) != 0))

100
/
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="hard", resource="requests.cpu"})
*
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="used", resource="requests.cpu"})

100
/
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="hard", resource="limits.cpu"})
*
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="used", resource="limits.cpu"})

100
/
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="hard", resource="requests.memory"})
*
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="used", resource="requests.memory"})

100
/
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="hard", resource="limits.memory"})
*
sum by (namespace) (kube_resourcequota{namespace=~"$namespace", type="used", resource="limits.memory"})

panels.description: No data means there are no Deployments in this namespace

targets.expr:
sum by (replicaset) (kube_replicaset_spec_replicas{namespace=~"$namespace"})
-
sum by (replicaset) (kube_replicaset_status_ready_replicas{namespace=~"$namespace"})
and
sum by (replicaset) (kube_replicaset_spec_replicas{namespace=~"$namespace"}) > 0

panels.title: Deployments/Replicasets with Replica missmatch

panels.description: No data means there are no Statefulsets in this namespace
panels.title: Statefulsets with Replica missmatch

panels.description: No data means there are no Jobs/CronJobs in this namespace
panels.title: Failed Jobs

panels.description: No data means there are no Daemonsets in this namespace
panels.title: Daemonsets misscheduled

targets.expr:
sum by(pod, httpStatusCode, routeId) (increase(spring_cloud_gateway_requests_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", uri!~".*prometheus.*|.*healthcheck.*|root|/\\{name\\}/\\{profiles.*"}[$__rate_interval]))
/
(sum by(pod, httpStatusCode,routeId) (increase(spring_cloud_gateway_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", uri!~".*prometheus.*|.*healthcheck.*|root|/\\{name\\}/\\{profiles.*"}[$__rate_interval])) != 0)
max by (pod, httpStatusCode, routeId) (spring_cloud_gateway_requests_seconds_max{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", uri!~".*prometheus.*|.*healthcheck.*"})

avg by (pod)(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", area="heap"})*100/avg by (pod)(jvm_memory_max_bytes{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", area="heap"})

avg by (pod)(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", area="nonheap"})*100/avg by (pod)(jvm_memory_max_bytes{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", area="nonheap"})
sum by (pod, method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", uri!~".*prometheus.*|.*healthcheck.*"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(pod, method, uri) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", uri!~"/api/prometheus|/api/healthcheck"}[$__rate_interval]))
 / 
(sum by(pod, method, uri) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", uri!~"/api/prometheus|/api/healthcheck"}[$__rate_interval]) !=0))
max by (pod, method, uri) (http_server_requests_seconds_max{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", uri!~".*prometheus.*|.*healthcheck.*"})

histogram_quantile(.95,sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", uri!~"/api/prometheus|/api/healthcheck"}[$__rate_interval])) by(pod, method, uri, le))

histogram_quantile(.99,sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", uri!~"/api/prometheus|/api/healthcheck"}[$__rate_interval])) by(pod, method, uri, le))
sum by (pod, method, clientName, uri) (irate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", uri!~".*prometheus.*|.*healthcheck.*"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(pod, clientName, method, uri) (increase(http_client_requests_seconds_sum{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", uri!~"/api/prometheus|/api/healthcheck"}[$__rate_interval]))
 / 
(sum by(pod, clientName, method, uri) (increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", uri!~"/api/prometheus|/api/healthcheck"}[$__rate_interval])))
max by (pod, clientName, method, uri) (http_client_requests_seconds_max{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", uri!~".*prometheus.*|.*healthcheck.*"})
sum by (pod, method, result) (irate(grpc_server_calls_seconds_count{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (pod, method, result) (increase(grpc_server_calls_seconds_sum{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (pod, method, result) (increase(grpc_server_calls_seconds_count{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"}[$__rate_interval]) != 0)
max by (pod, method, result) (grpc_server_calls_seconds_max{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"})
sum by (pod, service, method, statusCode) (irate(grpc_client_processing_duration_seconds_count{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (pod, service, method, statusCode) (increase(grpc_client_processing_duration_seconds_sum{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"}[$__rate_interval])) 
/ 
sum by (pod, service, method, statusCode) (increase(grpc_client_processing_duration_seconds_count{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"}[$__rate_interval]))
max by (pod, service, method, statusCode) (grpc_client_processing_duration_seconds_max{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"})

sum by (pod, pool) (hikaricp_connections_creation_seconds_sum{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"}) / sum by (pod, pool) (hikaricp_connections_creation_seconds_count{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"})

sum by (pod, pool) (hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_sum{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"}) / sum by (pod, pool) (hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_count{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"})

sum by (pod, pool) (hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_sum{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"}) / sum by (pod, pool) (hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_count{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"})
jvm_threads_live{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"} or jvm_threads_live_threads{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"}
jvm_threads_daemon{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"} or jvm_threads_daemon_threads{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"}
jvm_threads_peak{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"} or jvm_threads_peak_threads{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name"}
jvm_buffer_count{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", id="direct"} or jvm_buffer_count_buffers{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", id="direct"}
jvm_buffer_count{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", id="mapped"} or jvm_buffer_count_buffers{app="$app", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod_name", id="mapped"}
